channel.title: Publications :: SHARE-CZ Project in the Czech Republic
channel.description: Publications A complete database of all research publications, books, chapters in books, policy papers, First Result Books, working papers, and other publications based on collected SHARE data can be found at https://share-eric.eu/. Publications of registered users Selected results in English Selected research results in English are available here. Newsletters Newsletters in Czech and English. If you published a work based on SHARE data, please inform the coordinator following this link.
